snippet: Despite protests inside and outside Bank of America’s annual meeting, shareholders signed off on the $7 million 2011 pay package for the chief executive, Brian T. Moynihan.
abstract: Bank of America shareholders sign off on the $7 million 2011 pay package for the chief executive Brian T Moynihan, despite noisy protests inside and outside company's annual meeting; 92 percent of shareholders vote in favor of the proposal.
lead_paragraph: Despite protests inside and outside Bank of America’s annual meeting, shareholders signed off on the $7 million 2011 pay package for the chief executive, Brian T. Moynihan.

headline.seo: Bank of America Shareholders Complain, but Approve Pay
headline.main: Bank of America Investors Complain, but Approve Chief’s Pay
headline.print_headline: Bank of America Investors Complain, but Approve Chief’s Pay
